item.title: Self ID as SRE
item.itunes:author: Andrew Clay Shafer and Jessie Frazelle
item.itunes:summary: Reflecting on 20 years of system administration, Miss Amy, self identifies as an SRE/DBRE. She brings her perspectives, valuing resilience engineering and organizational dynamics over machines and tools, to the weird trick mafia audience.
item.description: Reflecting on 20 years of system administration, Miss Amy, self identifies as an SRE/DBRE. She brings her perspectives, valuing resilience engineering and organizational dynamics over machines and tools, to the weird trick mafia audience.
item.googleplay:description: Reflecting on 20 years of system administration, Miss Amy, self identifies as an SRE/DBRE. She brings her perspectives, valuing resilience engineering and organizational dynamics over machines and tools, to the weird trick mafia audience.
item.content:encoded: Reflecting on 20 years of system administration, Miss Amy, self identifies as an SRE/DBRE. She brings her perspectives, valuing resilience engineering and organizational dynamics over machines and tools, to the weird trick mafia audience.

item.title: Open Independence
item.itunes:author: Andrew Clay Shafer and Jessie Frazelle
item.itunes:summary: Henry Zhu joins the mafia. Open Source, Funding, Burnout, Fun and Games until someone gets hurt
item.description: Henry Zhu joins the mafia. Open Source, Funding, Burnout, Fun and Games until someone gets hurt
item.googleplay:description: Henry Zhu joins the mafia. Open Source, Funding, Burnout, Fun and Games until someone gets hurt
item.content:encoded: Henry Zhu (@left_pad), maintainer of Babel, the Open Source Javascript compiler, joins the mafia. He explains going full time open source independent for the last year, how he pays rent and what he loves/hates about open source. Hope you enjoy another episode of Jess (@jessfraz) and Andrew (@littleidea) tricking people into saying words about stuff.

item.title: Extremely on Brand
item.itunes:author: Andrew Clay Shafer and Jessie Frazelle
item.itunes:summary: Jess and Andrew get with Abby Fuller (@abbyfuller), Container Czarina extraordinaire, to share stories about startups, cold emails, hacking salesforce and getting in the middle of the cloud container game.
item.description: Jess and Andrew get with Abby Fuller (@abbyfuller), Container Czarina extraordinaire, to share stories about startups, cold emails, hacking salesforce and getting in the middle of the cloud container game.
item.googleplay:description: Jess and Andrew get with Abby Fuller (@abbyfuller), Container Czarina extraordinaire, to share stories about startups, cold emails, hacking salesforce and getting in the middle of the cloud container game.
item.content:encoded: Jess and Andrew get with Abby Fuller, Container Czarina extraordinaire, to share stories about startups, cold emails, hacking salesforce and getting in the middle of the cloud container game.

item.title: Find Your Laser Panda
item.itunes:author: Andrew Clay Shafer and Jessie Frazelle
item.itunes:summary: Sarah Drasner, Renaissance woman extraordinaire, shares stories, insight and advice with the Weird Trick Mafia. Tech, feelings, purpose, pandas.
item.description: Sarah Drasner, Renaissance woman extraordinaire, shares stories, insight and advice with the Weird Trick Mafia. Tech, feelings, purpose, pandas.
item.googleplay:description: Sarah Drasner, Renaissance woman extraordinaire, shares stories, insight and advice with the Weird Trick Mafia. Tech, feelings, purpose, pandas.
item.content:encoded:
Sarah Drasner, Renaissance woman extraordinaire, shares stories, insight and advice with the Weird Trick Mafia. Tech, feelings, purpose, pandas.

Mentioned:

The Hard Thing About Hard Things, Ben Horowitz

The Fifth Discipline, Peter M. Senge

The Truth About Burnout, Christina Maslach

item.title: Index of Refraction
item.itunes:author: Andrew Clay Shafer and Jessie Frazelle
item.itunes:summary: Jess goes on safari in San Francisco and a wild Lachlan Evenson appears. Jess, Andrew and Lachlan discuss the journey from building the internet in the Australian Outback to Cloud Native and wrap up weighing Net Neutrality.
item.description: Jess goes on safari in San Francisco and a wild Lachlan Evenson appears. Jess, Andrew and Lachlan discuss the journey from building the internet in the Australian Outback to Cloud Native and wrap up weighing Net Neutrality.
item.googleplay:description: Jess goes on safari in San Francisco and a wild Lachlan Evenson appears. Jess, Andrew and Lachlan discuss the journey from building the internet in the Australian Outback to Cloud Native and wrap up weighing Net Neutrality.
item.content:encoded: Jess goes on safari in San Francisco and a wild Lachlan Evenson appears. Jess, Andrew and Lachlan discuss the journey from building the internet in the Australian Outback to Cloud Native and wrap up weighing Net Neutrality.

item.title: Discover the Past
item.itunes:author: Andrew Clay Shafer and Jessie Frazelle
item.itunes:summary: Sophie Haskins, ops witch at github (@sophaskins) shares stories about collecting and learning from old hardware with our heroes Jess and Andrew
item.description: Sophie Haskins, ops witch at github (@sophaskins) shares stories about collecting and learning from old hardware with our heroes Jess and Andrew
item.googleplay:description: Sophie Haskins, ops witch at github (@sophaskins) shares stories about collecting and learning from old hardware with our heroes Jess and Andrew
item.content:encoded:
Sophie Haskins, ops witch at github (@sophaskins) shares stories about collecting and learning from old hardware with our heroes Jess and Andrew.

Learn more from Sophie at http://blog.pizzabox.computer

item.title: Remember the Future
item.itunes:author: Andrew Clay Shafer and Jessie Frazelle
item.itunes:summary: Erica Windisch, CTO, Co-Founder of IOpipe walks down memory lane, working with Jess and Drew, building clouds, serverless, and more random tech feelings.
item.description: Erica Windisch, CTO, Co-Founder of IOpipe walks down memory lane, working with Jess and Drew, building clouds, serverless, and more random tech feelings.

item.title: That's My Super Power

item.title: Resourceful & Persistent
item.itunes:author: Andrew Clay Shafer and Jessie Frazelle
item.itunes:summary: Verónica López (@maria_fibonacci) shares her software engineering journey from physics and mobile projects in Mexico to Cloud Native Kubernetes in Silicon Valley with Andrew and Jess.

item.title: Foundation Head
item.itunes:author: Andrew Clay Shafer and Jessie Frazelle
item.itunes:summary: Andrew Clay Shafer and Jess Frazelle discuss open source foundations.
item.description: Andrew Clay Shafer and Jess Frazelle discuss open source foundations.
item.googleplay:description: Andrew Clay Shafer and Jess Frazelle discuss open source foundations.
item.content:encoded:
Andrew and Jess discuss open source foundations.

Note from Jess: If you want to support open source projects checkout open collective, outreachy, and the software conservancy.
